original_text: Those foreigners and robbers will go into my holy temple. They will cause it to become unclean. But I will look away and I will allow them to do that.
korean_text: 내가 또 내 얼굴을 그들에게서 돌이키리니 그들이 내 은밀한 처소를 더럽히고 포악한 자도 거기 들어와서 더럽히리라

sentences.original_text: Those foreigners and robbers will go into my holy temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 이방인들과 강도들이 나의 거룩한 성전에 들어갈 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will cause it to become unclean.
and I will allow them to do that.
